output_list.reason: The morphToken function uses `msg.sender` as a random value, which can be predictable and allow unauthorized access.

The mintToken function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The burn function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of the contract to zero, aka the 'tradeTrap' issue.
